title: More Truth About UFOs | Guests: Sean Cahill & Sharyl Attkisson | 6/30/21
description:
Glenn and Stu explain how the Democrats flipped the script on race relations within the GOP in the 1960s. President Biden is fulfilling Woodrow Wilson’s progressive dream. Pat Gray joins to talk about the latest fugitive finally charged: a 69-year-old grandma who entered the Capitol on January 6. Climate protesters, including AOC and the Squad, blockaded the White House. UAP witness Sean Cahill joins to discuss the newly released UFO report and explain what he’s personally seen. Investigative reporter Sharyl Attkisson joins to review the NSA allegedly spying on Tucker Carlson and how the government could smear anybody it doesn’t like with the power it has. Alex Jones recently had some extremely odd things to say to Glenn.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
